level.heading: Certain representations prohibited.
level.text: Unless licensed in accordance with this subchapter, no person shall use the words or terms "land surveyor", or "licensed land surveyor," or any words for the purpose of implying that the person is authorized to perform the services of a land surveyor in the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
